definition: forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I closed the window. I combed his long, black hair from his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 我关上窗，为他梳理了额头长长的黑发。

sentences.english: She planted little kisses across its forehead and it gurgled.
sentences.chinese: 她在它的额头上吻了几下，它咯咯地笑了。

sentences.english: Oh, she said with an overly dramatic hit to her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 哦，她极富戏剧性地伸手拍一下额头，说。

sentences.english: A fault line of anger and distrust crossed his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒和怀疑在他额头上刻下了皱纹。

sentences.english: The forehead should be flat across from ear to ear.
sentences.chinese: 额头在两耳间成扁平状。
他的额头上伸出了汗珠。

sentences.english: He hit his forehead against the kerb when he fell.
sentences.chinese: 他摔倒时额头碰在了路边镶边石上。

sentences.english: Its length from occiput to muzzle is greater than the width at the brow.
sentences.chinese: 从枕骨部到吻部的长度大于额头的宽度。

sentences.english: Great drops of perspiration trickled down from his brow.
sentences.chinese: 大颗大颗的汗水从他的额头上淌下来。

sentences.english: His face was squarish with a high forehead heavy jaw and broad nose.
sentences.chinese: 他一章方脸上嵌着高额头，粗大的下颚和蒜头鼻。

sentences.english: I leaned over and touched my forehead to hers.
sentences.chinese: 我俯下身，用我的前额贴着她的额头。

sentences.english: A curl of black hair fell loosely across his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他的额头上垂着一绺散开的黑色卷发。

sentences.english: The priest anointed the new king with oil.
sentences.chinese: 牧师将油涂于新国王的额头以示开典。

sentences.english: She had a good heart, a beautiful face, and a golden star on her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她心地善良，美丽可爱，额头上还有一颗金色的星星。

sentences.english: She has a poor complexion and pock marks on her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她满面菜色，额头上有些麻子。

sentences.english: She gently pushed a lock of his sweat - drenched hair out of his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她轻轻地将一缕汗湿的头发从他的额头上拂开。

definition: the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
temple (on the sides of human head)
outer or inner corner of the eye/canthus
